SELECT * FROM (SELECT p.order_num AS orderNum , e.empl_name AS emplName , e.empl_email AS email , cp.name AS companyName , cp.code AS companyCode , cp.owner AS owner , cp.contact AS contact , cp.business_number AS businessNumber , p.order_date AS orderDate , p.published AS published , sp.deliverydate AS dueDate , ct.unitprice AS unitPrice , pt.partname AS partName , p.order_quantity AS orderQuantity , cp.account AS account , cp.currency AS currency , ct.partsSupply AS leadTime , CASE WHEN (SELECT MAX(ir.close) FROM inspection_result ir WHERE ir.order_num = p.order_num) THEN 5 WHEN (SELECT MAX(ir.inspection_num) FROM inspection_result ir WHERE ir.order_num = p.order_num) THEN 4 WHEN p.published != 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END
, p.emergency AS emergency , ROWNUM AS rn FROM purchase_order p INNER JOIN tbl_contract ct ON p.contract_num = ct.contractno INNER JOIN tbl_company cp ON ct.code = cp.code INNER JOIN employee e ON e.empl_num = p.empl_num INNER JOIN tbl_support sp ON p.support_num = sp.supportno INNER JOIN tbl_part pt ON ct.partcode = pt.partcode LEFT JOIN warehousing wh ON p.order_num = wh.order_num
ORDER BY emergency DESC, sp.deliverydate DESC, p.order_num ) tbl
WHERE (#{ curPageDto.pageNum } - 1) * #{ curPageDto.amount } < tbl.rn AND tbl.rn <= (#{ curPageDto.pageNum }) * #{ curPageDto.amount }

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM purchase_order p INNER JOIN tbl_contract ct ON p.contract_num = ct.contractno INNER JOIN tbl_company cp ON ct.code = cp.code INNER JOIN employee e ON e.empl_num = p.empl_num INNER JOIN tbl_support sp ON p.support_num = sp.supportno INNER JOIN tbl_part pt ON ct.partcode = pt.partcode
mapper.update: UPDATE purchase_order SET published = 1 WHERE order_num = #{ orderNum }

SELECT DISTINCT ct.code AS companyCode , (SELECT cp.name FROM tbl_company cp WHERE cp.code = ct.code) AS companyName FROM tbl_contract ct

SELECT p.order_num AS orderNum , p.order_date AS orderDate , (SELECT pt.partname FROM tbl_part pt WHERE pt.partcode = ct.partcode) AS partName , (SELECT cp.name FROM tbl_company cp WHERE cp.code = ct.code) AS companyName , ct.code AS companyCode FROM purchase_order p INNER JOIN tbl_contract ct ON p.contract_num = ct.contractno
WHERE #{ date } <= p.order_date AND p.order_date <= LAST_DAY(#{ date }) ORDER BY p.order_date DESC

SELECT e.empl_name AS emplName , e.empl_email AS email , cp.name AS companyName , cp.owner AS owner , cp.contact AS contact , cp.business_number AS businessNumber , p.order_date AS orderDate , sp.deliverydate AS dueDate , ct.unitprice AS unitPrice , (SELECT pt.partname FROM tbl_part pt WHERE pt.partcode = ct.partcode) AS partName , p.order_quantity AS orderQuantity , cp.account AS account , cp.currency AS currency FROM purchase_order p INNER JOIN tbl_contract ct ON p.contract_num = ct.contractno INNER JOIN tbl_company cp ON ct.code = cp.code INNER JOIN employee e ON e.empl_num = p.empl_num INNER JOIN tbl_support sp ON sp.supportno = p.support_num WHERE cp.code = #{ companyCode } AND p.order_date = #{ orderDate }
